profile.name: Jonas Muniz de Souza
profile.description:
Married, son of a Northeastern father and a Southern mother, I was born and raised in the West Zone of the Metropolitan Region of São Paulo. 
 It was during high school that the opportunity arose to have the first contact with computers through courses. From then onwards I awakened the passion for technology which led me to training in Information Systems where I had initial experiences with web development. 
 After nearly three years of experience in technical support, I embraced the opportunity in a new challenge acting as an administrative analyst in retail trade, in which I performed computer maintenance and managed social networks, among other tasks, and, in parallel, I got freelance experiences in Web Design developing static websites in html and css, posters, banners, flyers, folders and art for religious organizations. 
 In order to gain knowledge and experience of new technologies and the market, I sought a new training in Technology in Systems Analysis and Development with the hands-on model in experience in the area of ​​information technology. 
 I currently develop web projects (HTML, CSS, SASS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery), in addition to knowledge in database (MySQL, Oracle SQL), other languages ​​(Python, Java, PHP), tools (Figma, Node-RED, Eclipse, VSCode) and development methodologies (Scrum, MVC, UML). 
 In addition to web development, my passion extends to discovering places linked to nature, animals, culture and music where I play guitar, keyboard and make compositions.

education.school: Faculdade de Informática e Administração Paulista - FIAP
education.fieldOfStudy: Technology in Systems Analysis and Development

education.description: Final work in commercial automation system. Sales and inventory management for microenterprises.

experience.title: Administrative Analyst
experience.description:
Responsible for managing accounts payable and receivable. 
 Responsible for the registration of products and suppliers. 
 Responsible for issuing, organizing invoices and managing certificates. 
 Responsible for the website, social networks, IT maintenance, search and implementation of automation improvements. 
 Perfomance in communication and marketing creating graphic design and campaigns. 
 Perfomance in materials management and inventory control. 
 Perfomance in organization and development of documentation and processes. 
 Perfomance in front of the cashier and customer service.

experience.title: Service Desk Assistant
experience.description: Customer: Net Serviços. Perfomance in the reception, registration and follow-up of service calls, monitoring the status of all registered calls, escalation and forwarding to other areas of the organization, determination and resolution of first-level technical problems (incidents and requests), closing of incidents and confirmation with the client, documentation and development of procedures. At times I was responsible for training and assisting technical level professionals.

experience.title: Volunteer Basic Informatics Instructor
experience.description: I taught Basic Computer classes (Computer Concepts, Windows Operating System, Microsoft Office Package and Internet), prepared teaching material and managed teams as part of complementary activities on weekends with the Escola da Família Program.

certification.fieldOfStudy: Professional Qualification Certificate in Strategy and Technological Innovation with AI and IoT applications

Services Architeture, API and Mobile Architeture

portfolio.title: SGP - Presentation
portfolio.description: SGP (Skill Goal Professional) - It is a landing page developed with HTML5/CSS3 presentation for the 1st Sprint of Challenge B2W with the theme: Employee Experience. The Challenge with B2W is part of an evaluation of the 1st year of Technology in System Analysis and Development at FIAP

portfolio.title: Coronapp
portfolio.description: Coronapp - Solidary Delivery - It is a landing page developed with HTML5/CSS3 about the Corona Challenge for the second evaluation of the Responsive Web Development course of the Technology in Analysis and System Development course at FIAP. The Corona Challenge consists of presenting a solution to the impacts caused by Covid-19.

portfolio.title: Filmov
portfolio.description: A website for Movies and Series developed using only HTML5/CSS3 for the first evaluation of the Responsive Web Development discipline of the Technology Analysis and System Development course at FIAP.
